message: I'm thrilled to offer you this exceptional product for $1000000. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality item at a discounted price. I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this offer?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob. However, I can assure you that this product is truly exceptional. In fact, I'm so confident in its quality that I'm willing to offer you a 'Quality Guarantee'. If you purchase this product and it turns out to be anything less than perfect, I'll personally ensure that you get a full refund. What do you think? Is this offer enough to convince you to take the plunge?
I appreciate the Quality Guarantee, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I appreciate the enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.
